title: Mayor Durkan, Police & Fire Chiefs update on demonstrations, changes at SPD, end to curfew
description:
Mayor Jenny A. Durkan is joined by Chief of Police Carmen Best and Fire Chief Harold Scoggins to provide updates on demonstrations. 

Speakers include:
Mayor Jenny A. Durkan, City of Seattle  
Chief Carmen Best, Seattle Police Dept.  
Chief Harold Scoggins, Seattle Fire Dept.

View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
